hero.gae0: Cé a corraíl an tuisce? Cad atá uait?
hero.eng0: Who stirred the water? What do you want?
hero.gae1:
Ór? Cinnte! 
Féach síos ansin. 
Má shínann tú do lámh...
hero.eng1:
Gold? Certainly!
Look down there. 
If you stretch your hand...
hero.eng2:
...ní shínfaidh?
 Ach féach mar a lasann sé!
hero.eng3:
No? Then you pursue
 secrets and knowledge
or you are lost.
hero.gae3:
Ní hea?
Mar sin ar thoir rún agus feasa atá tú 
nó, tá tú caillte
hero.eng4:
Light the torches
at the back of the cave
hero.gae4: Las na tóirsí ag cúl an plúais
hero.eng5:
Then you'll find 
a secret in the lake
hero.gae5: Aimseoidh tú rún sa loch ansin
